name: hbsb
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0
body: |- wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wal(s2, wsb(s0, s1, w0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wal(s2, wsb(s0, s1, w0)))
-| wnf(s2, wsb(s0, s1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wal(s2, wsb(s0, s1, w0)))
-| wnf(s2, wsb(s0, s1, w0))

body.origin:
|- wnf(s2, wsb(s0, s1, w0))
-| wnf(s2, w0)
-| diffss(s2, s0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wal(s2, wsb(s0, s1, w0)))
-| wnf(s2, w0)
-| diffss(s2, s0)

|- wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wal(s2, wsb(s0, s1, w0)))
-| diffss(s2, s0)
-| wi(w0, wal(s2, w0))

|- wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wal(s2, wsb(s0, s1, w0)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s2, w0))
-| diffss(s0, s2)

comment: If ` z ` is not free in ` ph ` , it is not free in ` [ y / x ] ph ` when ` y ` and ` z ` are distinct. (Contributed by NM, 12-Aug-1993.)
